who we are

We are designers and engineers who love making products. Team up with us to develop your ideas from concept to manufacture.

IDEATE
VALIDATE
CREATE

what we do

  • Industrial Design
    Industrial Design applies insights into user behavior and culture to create elegant, intuitive product solutions. read more...
    • A symphony can only be as good as the sheet music and a product can only be as good as the design intent. We work hard to nail the intent up front since minutes here can translate to hours or days later in the project. To get there quickly we will do strategic research, hand-sketching, and fast mock-ups before spending the time to build out a detailed CAD model or nice-looking prototype. see our tools & deliverables...
      deliverables:
      • Stakeholder Interviews and Research Findings
      • Handmade Sketches
      • Mood/Style Boards
      • “Duct tape” Mockups
      • “Looks-Like” Prototypes
      • Solidworks CAD with curvature continuous surfacing
      • 3D prints
      • Digital renderings
      tools:
      • Cintiq drawing tablet
      • Solidworks 3D
      • Rhinoceros 3D with Grasshopper
      • Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
      • Keyshot
  • Electrical Engineering
    Electrical Engineering harnesses semiconductor technologies to give your product a brain. read more...
    • Based on product requirements, we carefully choose electrical components that are combined to create schematics. Schematics are the map outlining how each individual component is connected and communicates with one another. Selection and arrangement of these components in the PCB layout drives the shape, size, and cost of the final unit. We are capable of analog and digital designs and some of our experience includes - power management, internet of things (IoT), system on chip (SOC), wearables, BLE, Wifi, RF, Ultra-Low Power, and sensor based designs. see our tools & deliverables...
      deliverables:
      • Schematics
      • PCB Layout
      • Gerber Files
      • Firmware Files
      • FCC Certifications
      • Electrical Testing Results
      tools:
      • Altium Designer
      • Spice Simulation
      • Eagle Designer
      • Dev/SDK kits
      • Arduino/Raspberry Pi
      • Breadboards/Protoboards
  • Mechanical Engineering
    Mechanical Engineering builds on principles from physics to answer tangible questions in product development. read more...
    • There are always a surprising number of details to figure out with any physical product. How long will it last, will it hold up to environmental conditions, are you using the right materials, or could your device be more efficient? Mechanical Engineering draws on knowledge of mechanics of materials and materials science, heat transfer, fluid flow, mechanisms and dynamics, and more to answer practical questions like these in the product development process. see our tools & deliverables...
      deliverables:
      • “Duct Tape” Mockups
      • “Works-Like” Prototypes
      • Part Files (.STEP/.IGES/.x_t)
      • Part Drawings (PDF/DXF)
      • Assembly Files & Instructions
      • Toleranced Parts
      tools:
      • Pencil & Paper
      • 3D Printers
      • SOLIDWORKS 3D CAD
      • SOLIDWORKS Simulation
      • Finite Element Analysis (FEA)
      • Spreadsheets
      • ASME GD&T Y14.5 2009 & other standards

let's talk

Stop sitting on that idea. We are here to help you navigate your way from concept to manufacture.
